message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000. I believe this is reflective of its worth and the benefits it offers.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the initial price of $1,500,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, however, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000. I believe this price point represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $1,300,000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions, and I hope it will be acceptable to you.
